Uproar smiles and salutes Lord Elder, enthusiastically addressing his reque=
st.

"You got it sir, I'll show him the Ark and the recharging chambers. Oh=
, by the way, one more question.. Hydras knows Perceptor's one of us now, h=
ow are we gonna fight 'em off if he tries another attack on the Ark?"

Mean=
while, in Legacy's chamber, Straight Shot now sees why he was so concerned =
about the time space continum.  She had not known what really happened, and=
 at the time it did happen she had not yet been a part of the Autobot Facti=
on.  She stands thoughtfully for a moment, now taking in what she had been =
missing for a long time.

" Wow, that part I never did understand..  That s=
ure explains things. I'm glad I did talk to you, Legacy.  So by doing what =
he did, Starscream saved our faction...  I've only heard bits'n pieces abou=
t Starscream's relationship with Megatron, and from what I learned, they ne=
ver did see eye to eye. Anyway, thanks for the explanation and the video fe=
ed, it was really useful. I better let ya get ta the bridge now.  Thanks ag=
ain."

She gets down from where she was standing and bids Legacy good bye f=
or the time being.
